Title: Information Exposure
Description: REST API returns list of all site accesses.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 7.3.0 before 7.3.2.1, all versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.2.4.1, all versions starting from 6.8.0 before 6.13.5.1, all versions starting from 6.0.0 before 6.7.9.1, all versions starting from 5.4.0 before 5.4.13.1, all versions starting from 5.3.0 before 5.3.12.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 7.3.0, all versions starting from 7.3.2.1, all versions before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.2.4.1, all versions before 6.8.0, all versions starting from 6.13.5.1, all versions before 6.0.0, all versions starting from 6.7.9.1, all versions before 5.4.0, all versions starting from 5.4.13.1, all versions before 5.3.0, all versions starting from 5.3.12.1
